summary.para: Contains classes that implement reporting functionality in Blazor applications.
A base class for Document Viewer controls in Blazor Server and WebAssembly applications.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerBase.AccessibilityCompliant

summary.para: Enables accessibility mode.

member.value: True to enable accessibility mode; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerBase.Height

summary.para: Gets or sets the Document Viewer’s height on a page.

member.value: A string that specifies the control’s height on a page. The default value is ‘700px’.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerBase.MobileMode

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to configure the Document Viewer for mobile devices.

member.value: True to configure the Document Viewer for mobile devices; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerBase.OpenReport(System.String)

summary.para: Opens the specified report on the Web Document Viewer’s client side. Allows you to refresh a preview for the loaded report.

member.param: A string that specifies the report’s URL.
member.returns: A Task that is completed when the report is opened.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerBase.ResetParameters

summary.para: Resets the report parameter values to the default values.

member.returns: A Task that is completed when the parameters are reset.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerBase.RightToLeft

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable a right-to-left layout in the Document Viewer’s UI.

member.value: True to enable the RTL layout; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerBase.StartBuild

summary.para: Starts building a report document.

member.returns: A Task that is completed when the document is created.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerBase.Width

summary.para: Gets or sets the Document Viewer’s width on a page.

member.value: A string that specifies the control’s width on a page. The default value is ‘100%’.

summary.para: Specifies client-side event handler functions for the Web Document Viewer. See DxDocumentViewerCallbacks Members for the complete list of events.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.BeforeRender

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the BeforeRender client-side event that allows you to perform any action before the Web Document Viewer is rendered.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the BeforeRender event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.CustomizeElements

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the CustomizeElements client-side event that allows you to customize the Web Document Viewer UI elements.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the CustomizeElements event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.CustomizeExportOptions

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the CustomizeExportOptions client-side event that allows you hide export formats and specify the default export options.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the CustomizeExportOptions event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.CustomizeLocalization

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the CustomizeLocalization client-side event that allows you localize the Web Document Viewer.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the CustomizeLocalization event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.CustomizeMenuActions

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the CustomizeMenuActions client-side event that enables you to customize the Web Document Viewer toolbar and menu.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the CustomizeMenuActions event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.CustomizeParameterEditors

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the CustomizeParameterEditors client-side event that allows you to specify the parameter editor for the report parameter.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the CustomizeParameterEditors event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.CustomizeParameterLookUpSource

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the CustomizeParameterLookUpSource client-side event that allows you to specify look-up values for the parameter editor.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the CustomizeParameterLookUpSource event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.DocumentReady

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the DocumentReady client-side event that occurs before the Document Viewer loads a document.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the DocumentReady event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.EditingFieldChanged

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the EditingFieldChanged client-side event that allows you to respond to a field value change.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the EditingFieldChanged event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.OnExport

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the OnExport client-side event that allows you to pass data to the server before the requests to print the document or to get the exported document are executed.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the OnExport event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.OnServerError

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the OnServerError client-side event that allows you to perform actions when a Fetch request completes with an error.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the OnServerError event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.ParametersInitialized

summary.para: Specifies the JavaScript function that handles the client-side ParametersInitialized event and allows you to modify client-side parameter values after initialization before they are displayed.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function or entire JavaScript function code that runs when the ParametersInitialized event occurs.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.ParametersReset

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the ParametersReset client-side event that occurs when the report parameter values are reset.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the ParametersReset event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.ParametersSubmitted

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the ParametersSubmitted client-side event that occurs when the user clicks Submit in the Parameters Panel.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the ParametersSubmitted event.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerCallbacks.PreviewClick

summary.para: Specifies the handler for the PreviewClick client-side event that occurs when the user clicks the document area in the Web Document Viewer.

member.value: The name of a JavaScript function used to handle the PreviewClick event.

summary.para: Contains settings that apply to print and export operations.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerExportSettings.ShowPrintNotificationDialog

summary.para: Specifies whether to display an additional dialog that allows users to download the PDF file sent to printing.

member.value: true, to display an additional dialog; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerExportSettings.UseAsynchronousExport

summary.para: Allows you to export documents asynchronously.

member.value: True to perform export operations asynchronously; false to export documents in the same UI thread.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerExportSettings.UseSameTab

summary.para: Specifies whether to print and export documents in the browser tab that contains the Document Viewer.

member.value: true, to print and export documents in the tab that contains the Document Viewer; false to open another browser tab for print and export.

summary.para: A nested component that provides options for the Web Document Viewer’s mobile mode.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerMobileModeSettings.AnimationEnabled

summary.para: Gets or sets whether actions are animated.

member.value: True if the actions ae animated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerMobileModeSettings.ReaderMode

summary.para: Gets or sets whether to enable the reader mode that displays document pages without page borders.

member.value: True to enable the reader mode; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Contains the progress bar’s settings. The progress bar indicates the progress of a document generation.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerProgressBarSettings.KeepOnVisibleArea

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the progress bar keeps its position in a visible area when a user scrolls a web page.

member.value: True if the progress bar keeps its position when a page scrolls; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Gets or sets the progress bar’s relative position on a page.
A nested component that enables you to configure the Web Document Viewer to display documents that are created remotely with the DevExpress Report and Dashboard Server.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerRemoteSettings.AuthToken

summary.para: Gets or sest the Bearer token to access documents on the Report and Dashboard Server.

member.value: A string that is the Bearer token.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerRemoteSettings.ServerUri

summary.para: Gets or sets the Report and Dashboard Server URI.

member.value: A string that is the Report and Dashboard Server URI.

summary.para: Contains settings that apply to the Web Document Viewer’s search operations.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerSearchSettings.SearchEnabled

summary.para: Allows you to hide search actions.

member.value: true to show search actions; otherwise, false

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerSearchSettings.UseAsyncSearch

summary.para: Specifies whether the Web Document Viewer uses asynchronous search.

member.value: true to use asynchronous search; otherwise, false.

summary.para: A nested component that allows you to customize the Document Viewer’s tab panel.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerTabPanelSettings.Position

summary.para: Gets or sets the tab panel’s position.

member.value: A enumeration memeber that identifies the tab panel position.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxDocumentViewerTabPanelSettings.Width

summary.para: Specifies the tab panel’s width.

member.value: An integer that is the width in pixels.

summary.para: Contains settings that configure the user interface related to the data sources in the Report Designer.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesignerDataSourceSettings.AllowAddDataSource

summary.para: Hides the Add Data Source button in the Field List.

member.value: true to show the Add Data Source button; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesignerDataSourceSettings.AllowEditDataSource

summary.para: Hides UI elements that allow the user to edit the data source and queries in the Field List.

member.value: true to show UI elements that allow the user to edit the data source and queries in the Field List; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesignerDataSourceSettings.AllowRemoveDataSource

summary.para: Hides the UI element that allows a user to remove the data source from the Web End-User Report Designer in the Field List.

member.value: true to show the UI element that allows a user to remove the data source from the Web End-User Report Designer in the Field List; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.para: Allows you to specify settings that apply to print and export operations.

member.value: A class that contains settings that apply to print and export operations.

summary.para: Allows you to specify search settings.
Provides access to the Report Designer‘s wizard settings.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesignerWizardSettings.EnableJsonDataSource

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the Specify Data Source Settings (JSON) page is enabled in the Report Wizard and Data Source Wizard.

member.value: True, to enable the Specify Data Source Settings (JSON) page; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesignerWizardSettings.EnableObjectDataSource

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the Specify Data Source Settings (Object) page is enabled in the Report Wizard and Data Source Wizard.

member.value: True, to enable the Specify Data Source Settings (Object) page; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesignerWizardSettings.EnableSqlDataSource

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the Specify Data Source Settings (Database) page is enabled in the Report Wizard and Data Source Wizard.

member.value: True, to enable the Specify Data Source Settings (Database) page; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesignerWizardSettings.ReportWizardTemplatesSearchBoxVisibility

summary.para: Specifies whether to display the search box on the Select Report Type page.

member.value: The enumeration member that specifies whether to display the report template search box.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesignerWizardSettings.UseFullscreenWizard

summary.para: Specifies whether to use the Report Wizard version that runs in the fullscreen mode.

member.value: True, to use the Report Wizard (Fullscreen) version; false, to use the Report Wizard (Popup) version.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Blazor.Reporting.DxReportDesignerWizardSettings.UseMasterDetailWizard

summary.para: Specifies whether the Report Wizard can create master-detail reports and specify its grouping and summary options.

member.value: True, to use the master-detail Report Wizard version; false, to use the standard Report Wizard version.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Lists values that specify the tab panel position in the Document Viewer.
The tab panel is at the left side of the Document Viewer.
The tab panel is at the right side of the Document Viewer.
